# BlackFlag ECU v2.2 - Major Documentation Update

**Professional Automotive ECU Diagnostic & Tuning Suite**

## What's New

### Expanded Vehicle Database
- **200+ vehicles** across 45 manufacturers
- Full coverage: Ford, GM, Stellantis, BMW, Mercedes, Audi, VW, Toyota, Porsche, Tesla, and more
- Exotic support: Ferrari, Lamborghini, McLaren, Lotus, Aston Martin, Bentley, Rolls-Royce
- EV platform support for Tesla, Rivian, Lucid, Polestar

### Comprehensive Wiring Documentation
- **OBD-II J1962 pinouts** with manufacturer-specific pins
- **ECU connector diagrams**: Bosch MED17/MG1, Delphi E39, Continental SIM2K, Denso
- **CAN bus topology**: GM, Ford, CAN-FD architecture diagrams
- **Bench flash harness guides**: Tricore boot modes, BDM connections
- **J2534 Pass-Thru reference**: Protocol support, API flow, error codes

### Improved Diagram Quality
- Clean, cross-platform compatible formatting
- Consistent table structures
- Simplified ASCII art for universal display

## Supported Features

- Full J2534 Pass-Thru API support
- Read/Write ECU calibrations
- DTC management
- Live data streaming
- Checksum correction
- Bench flash support

## Get Started

```bash
git clone https://github.com/bad-antics/blackflag-ecu.git
```

## Related: BlackFlag HD

Check out our new **heavy-duty counterpart** for Class 4-8 commercial vehicles:
- [BlackFlag HD](https://github.com/bad-antics/blackflag-hd)
- J1939/J1708 protocol support
- Freightliner, Kenworth, Peterbilt, Volvo, Mack coverage
- Cummins, Detroit, PACCAR, CAT engine support
